description: Wolf-Gang (written with kanji 旅狼 meaning `travelling wolf` and pronounced as ヴォルフガング Vorufu Gangu) is a clan in the full-dive VR game Shangri-La Frontier. It was formed by http://anidb.net/ch124888 [Arthur Pencilgon], http://anidb.net/ch124892 [Sunraku] and http://anidb.net/ch124890 [OiKatzo] after their completion of the unique scenario involving http://anidb.net/ch136339 [Wethermon] and http://anidb.net/ch136340 [Setsuna] (titled 「此岸より彼岸へ愛を込めて」 Shigan yori Higan e Ai o Komete).
name: Wolf-Gang
